body:
Installing xz fails due to a certificate issue, which is weird because it's using an `http` URL.

I'm learning my way around a new system.  It lacks things (no emacs, the horror!) and I'm using Spack to spin them up.

The system is:

```
$ cat /etc/lsb-release
DISTRIB_ID=Ubuntu
DISTRIB_RELEASE=14.04
DISTRIB_CODENAME=trusty
DISTRIB_DESCRIPTION="Ubuntu 14.04.1 LTS"
```

and I'm using the system compilers and etc...., looks like `v4.8.2`.

It's entirely possible that this system has an old set of CA certs or ...  I'll keep digging.

### Expected Result

I tried to `spack install git`, which in turn tried to install `xz`.  I expected it to succeed.

### Actual Result

